title: Can you share this petition?
description:
Hi everyone!

Thank you for signing the petition to get Amber removed from SAG-AFTRA! As of this writing, we have 1,755 signatures!

Can each of you share this petition at least once on social media?

Here's the link:
https://www.change.org/p/remove-amber-heard-from-sag-aftra

Places to postÂ 
- YouTube
- Twitter
- IG
- TikTok
- Facebook

Thanks for your help!

#TeamJohnny

title: Please share!
description:
Hi everyone!

Thank you for signing the petition to get Amber removed from SAG-AFTRA!

Can you help by sharing the petition? Here's the link:
https://www.change.org/p/remove-amber-heard-from-sag-aftra

Several pages on Facebook have been posting a lot about the trial - it's best to post the link RIGHT AFTER the articles have been posted:
- https://www.facebook.com/businessinsider
- https://www.facebook.com/LADbible

Other places to post
- YouTube (ET has a scrolling chat going)
- Twitter
- IG
- TikTok

Thanks for your help!

#TeamJohnny
